ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.2_0: At that time a disciple of the nun Thullanandā was suffering, but Thullanandā neither nursed her nor made any effort to have someone else nurse her.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.3_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.4_0: “How can Venerable Thullanandā not nurse a suffering disciple, nor make any effort to have someone else nurse her?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.5_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā didn’t do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.8_0: “... How can the nun Thullanandā not nurse a suffering disciple, nor make any effort to have someone else nurse her?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.9_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.10_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.11.1_0: ‘If a nun does not nurse a suffering disciple, nor makes any effort to have someone else nurse her, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.1.11_0: Nor makes any effort to have someone else nurse her:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.1.12_0: she does not ask anyone else to take her away.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.1.13_0: If she thinks, “I won’t nurse her, nor will I make any effort to have someone else nurse her,” then by the mere fact of giving up her duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.1.14_0: If she does not nurse, nor makes any effort to have someone else nurse, a pupil or one who is not fully ordained, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.2.3_0: if she searches, but does not find anyone to invite for correction;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.2.7_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.2.8_0: The fourth training rule is finished.
